config.appColors.description: Shows and lets you modify the colors of the App
config.appColors.info:
First the contrast slider affects how the different color tones are chosen from your base colors.
Then per default only one default primary color is used as a seed to build all color tones (see below).
But you can also modify each of the additional colors manually which can be cleared again by resetting to default.
config.debugPrintGameWindowNames.descrip: Logs all open windows after restart of the app for debugging
config.alwaysMatchGameWindowNamesEqual.d: The window of the game has to have the same name. Otherwise it will be tested if the target name is contained in the window name
